title: Thank you, Makoto Shinkai.
review: Everything in this movie is quite perfect-Timing, Plot, Backsound. From the start, i thought this movie would be boring just like any other Anime nowadays, but Makoto Shinkai give us something different. Both main characters he brought in this movie was so very catching. The title just very perfect. And for the last, this movie bring me a new point of view. Thank you, Makoto Shinkai.
